thread.section_title: Snusline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snusline | snusline.com | 7 of 94
thread.title: Julius

author: Julius
title: Julius
text:
I was craving for some snus one day, and couldnt find any online stores that would sell and ship snus to EU countries. And I found Snusline.
They have a very big variety of snuses, i picked up some siberia extreme. The website is well designed, the order process is very simple, and most of all - they have free shipping! My snus arrived in a three weeks before shipment. The shipping could have a tracking options and could be faster, but considering that they ship for free its not a disadvantage! I also like these exotic hebrew warnings! Also, they could start selling american dip one day. Will definetly come back!
